Everyone is panicking, but are they looking at the right level?
 $SOL  has been taking a beating all day. We‚Äôve just been making lower highs since that $128.74 rejection, and it honestly felt like it was heading for a total breakdown.
But check the bounce at $122.04. The buyers finally stepped in there to keep things from getting ugly. Right now we're hovering around $123.96, trying to claw back some ground.
If we can‚Äôt flip $124.65 back into support soon, this is just a dead cat bounce before another drop. I‚Äôm watching the next few hourly candles to see if the volume actually picks up or if this is just a fakeout.

#SOL

$SOL  treasury firm Upexi has filed a $1B shelf registration with the SEC, allowing it to raise funds gradually when market conditions are right rather than all at once. This gives Upexi more flexibility to support future growth, expand its treasury, and pursue strategic opportunities within the Solana ecosystem. While no immediate fundraising is planned, the move signals long-term confidence and readiness to scale.  Ôªø#SOL

üì¢ Official Announcement.

‚ÄãToday, we are taking a strategic and decisive step for the future of EXD and our governance.

‚Äã‚úÖ We have made the decision to migrate EXD to the Solana network ‚Äî and the process begins today.

‚Äãüåç Why Solana? (Strategic Decision)

The Polygon network played an important role, but the landscape has changed over the past months. We have identified:

‚Äã‚Ä¢ Loss of Traction: A significant reduction in the Polygon ecosystem.

‚Ä¢ Limited Liquidity: Lower depth in DEXs (decentralized exchanges).

‚Ä¢ Instability: Recurring RPC issues, delays, and operational failures.

‚Ä¢ Impact of POL: The sharp decline of the network's base currency amplifies the negative impact.

‚ÄãüöÄ The Solana Advantage: Currently, Solana concentrates the highest market traction and liquidity. We are repositioning EXD into a more competitive, scalable, and attractive ecosystem for the next cycle.

‚ÄãüîÅ How the Migration Will Work (IMPORTANT)

‚ÄãThe migration will be 1:1. You will receive the exact same amount of EXD on the Solana network.

‚Äã1Ô∏è‚É£ For holders with EXD on the EADX Exchange:
‚Ä¢ The migration will be automatic. No action is required.

‚Äã2Ô∏è‚É£ For holders with EXD in wallets (MetaMask, Trust Wallet, etc.):
‚Ä¢ You must send your EXD to the official project address (provided in the form).

‚Ä¢ In the Official Form, you will provide:
- Your sending address (current wallet).
- Your Solana receiving address.
‚Ä¢ After validation, the new EXD tokens will be sent to your Solana wallet.

‚Äãüìä Supply and Tokenomics

‚Ä¢ Max Supply: 1,000,000 (1M) EXD.

‚Ä¢ Locked Tokens: 825,000 EXD remain locked until the end of 2026.

‚Ä¢ Liquidity: A new pool will be opened on Raydium (Solana‚Äôs leading DEX).

‚Ä¢ Buyback: The $1,000‚Äì$1,500 planned buyback will be redirected as initial liquidity on Solana.

‚ÄãüéØ What This Means
We are placing EXD where the financial volume is happening. This is the move that precedes major growth phases.

‚Äãüìå The official form will be published today. Once live, the message will be pinned.

‚ÄãStay tuned for the next announcements.

‚ÄãBest,
EADX Team

Prediction markets don‚Äôt fail because people stop predicting.
They fail when liquidity can‚Äôt scale with conviction.

That‚Äôs exactly the problem @intodotspace is solving - and why it caught my attention.

Space isn‚Äôt built for casual bets or novelty markets.
It‚Äôs a high-performance prediction layer on Solana, designed for leverage, throughput, and sustained volume.

What stands out to me:
üîπ 10√ó leverage for traders with high-conviction views
üîπ Zero maker fees + protocol buyback & burn mechanics
üîπ Liquidity-first market architecture (this is the real unlock)
üîπ Competitive seasons that keep volume alive, not episodic
üîπ Built by the team behind the $1.5B UFO ecosystem - proven at scale

Most prediction apps try to look fun.
Space is trying to work under pressure.

This isn‚Äôt a betting product.
It‚Äôs infrastructure for pricing belief- continuously, competitively, and at scale.

IntoDotSpace isn‚Äôt experimenting with prediction markets.
They‚Äôre engineering the ones that can survive real volume.

$SOL   Not much has changed since the last update the structure still looks weak. Price continues to struggle with the $127 level, and multiple attempts to break through have been firmly rejected, pushing it back toward support.  At this stage, a quick dip below $120 is looking more likely before we see another attempt to move higher. What really matters is how price reacts there  both in terms of volume and acceptance around key levels like the volume profile and COB. A weak bounce could mean further downside, while strong buying could trigger another push back toward resistance.  Until then,$127 remains the key level that will determine the next direction. Prediction markets only work when data is trusted ‚ö°Ô∏è  $POL  has become the go-to for onchain prediction markets because liquidity is deep and execution stays clean under pressure.  $SOL  continues to grow, but peak activity still exposes friction where speed alone isn‚Äôt enough.  Here‚Äôs the part traders don‚Äôt always think about.  Prediction markets aren‚Äôt just about fast fills. They depend on reliable data, verifiable outcomes, and settlement that can‚Äôt be disputed after the fact.  That‚Äôs where IOTA fits into the bigger picture.  IOTA focuses on making external data, events, and outcomes verifiable at the protocol level. When markets resolve, the result needs proof, not opinion.  As prediction markets expand beyond crypto-native bets into real-world events, data integrity becomes the edge.  Speed gets you trades. Trust keeps markets alive.  That‚Äôs the layer IOTA is building.  #Macro Insights#

amplifying swings in market sentiment.

I'm bullish on $SOL   Our bullish case for Solana (SOL)! üìàüìàREAD BELOW!üìàüìà  üìàSolana is designed for speed at the base layer, which allows applications to run smoothly without relying heavily on secondary scaling systems. Transactions finalize quickly and cost very little, making the network feel more like a traditional consumer app platform than a blockchain.  üìàThe chain has developed strong organic usage. Large numbers of users actively trade, mint, play, and interact on Solana every day, which shows demand beyond speculation. This level of activity gives the ecosystem resilience and real economic throughput.  üìàSolana‚Äôs low fees enable use cases that are not practical on more expensive networks. Micropayments, gaming, social applications, and high-frequency trading all benefit from fast execution and predictable costs.  üìàDeveloper interest has rebounded and continued to grow. Improved tooling, better documentation, and ecosystem funding have made Solana an attractive environment for building new applications.  üìàReliability has improved significantly over time. Network upgrades and multiple validator clients have reduced downtime risk and strengthened decentralization.  üìàSOL itself has clear utility. It is required for transaction fees, staking, and securing the network, which ties token demand to actual usage.  üìàSolana is particularly well positioned for consumer-facing crypto. If adoption expands beyond finance into everyday digital experiences, Solana‚Äôs performance advantages become increasingly important.  üìàüìàLong term thesisüìàüìà If crypto shifts toward real-world usage and high-volume applications, Solana stands to benefit as a fast, low-cost execution layer built for scale.

I‚Äôve seen dozens of prediction markets.
Most of them misunderstand where the real value comes from.

@duel_duck gets it - users create the market.

Built on Solana, Duel Duck isn‚Äôt just a place to place predictions.
It‚Äôs a peer-to-peer InfoFi engine where attention, influence, and participation become the asset.

What made me lean in:

üîπ Creators earn directly from the activity they generate - not just platform incentives
üîπ A Web2-friendly UX that actually converts non-crypto users
üîπ Scalable earning loops instead of one-time wins
